commit.message:
re PR fortran/8587 ((double complex zero)**(double prec number) = NAN instead of zero)

2002-11-19  Toon Moene  <toon@moene.indiv.nluug.nl>

	PR fortran/8587
	* libF77/pow_zz.c: Handle (0.0, 0.0) ** power.

2002-11-19  Toon Moene  <toon@moene.indiv.nluug.nl>

	PR fortran/8587
	* news.texi: Show PR fortran/8587 fixed.

From-SVN: r59280
